org.easetech.easytest.util
Class ConfigContext

java.lang.Object
  org.easetech.easytest.util.ConfigContext

public final class ConfigContext
extends java.lang.Object

A context class for holding the Configuration beans declared by the user. This class provides a utility to identify a test bean declared using TestBean annotations inside a class that is decalred in the test class using TestConfigProvider
